name: Damage Control (all bugs fixed)
description:
YOUR GUN IS MALFUNCTIONING!!!

You need to take it to a repair guy quickly!

Use arrow keys left and right to get around

Find the repair guy which is green in color

Carrying a loaded gun might frighten the people

so don't try to attract much attention to yourself

or the police would come to get you!

so either get to the repair guy or get shot by the police

WHATEVER YOU DO, DON'T KILL ANYONE!!!!

This is was meant to be my submission for the GMTK game jam but the original got messed up when exporting so this is the properly exported version
